org.apache.flink.core.testutils

类 CommonTestUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.core.testutils.CommonTestUtils

  • public class CommonTestUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains reusable utility methods for unit tests.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getTempDir

        public static java.lang.String getTempDir()
        Reads the path to the directory for temporary files from the configuration and returns it.
        返回:
        the path to the directory for temporary files

      • createCopySerializable

        public static <T extends java.io.Serializable> T createCopySerializable(T original)
                                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a copy of an object via Java Serialization.
        参数:
        original - The original object.
        返回:
        The copied object.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • createTempFile

        public static java.lang.String createTempFile(java.lang.String contents)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a temporary file that contains the given string. The file is written with the platform's default encoding.

        The temp file is automatically deleted on JVM exit.

        参数:
        contents - The contents to be written to the file.
        返回:
        The temp file URI.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • blockForeverNonInterruptibly

        public static void blockForeverNonInterruptibly()
        Permanently blocks the current thread. The thread cannot be woken up via Thread.interrupt().

      • setEnv

        public static void setEnv(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> newenv)

      • setEnv

        public static void setEnv(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> newenv,
                          boolean clearExisting)

      • createObjectForClassNotInClassPath

        public static java.io.Serializable createObjectForClassNotInClassPath(java.lang.ClassLoader targetClassLoader)
        Creates a new class that is not part of the classpath that the current JVM uses, and instantiates it.

        This method uses createClassNotInClassPath(ClassLoader) to define the new class.

        参数:
        targetClassLoader - The class loader to attach the class to
        返回:
        The object instantiated from the newly defined class.

      • createClassNotInClassPath

        public static java.lang.Class<? extends java.io.Serializable> createClassNotInClassPath(java.lang.ClassLoader targetClassLoader)
        Creates a new class that is not part of the classpath that the current JVM uses. The class is ad-hoc defined and attached to the given ClassLoader.
        参数:
        targetClassLoader - The class loader to attach the class to
        返回:
        The newly defined class

      • getUnsafe

        private static sun.misc.Unsafe getUnsafe()

      • containsCause

        public static boolean containsCause(java.lang.Throwable throwable,
                                    java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Throwable> cause)
        Checks whether the given throwable contains the given cause as a cause. The cause is not checked on equality but on type equality.
        参数:
        throwable - Throwable to check for the cause
        cause - Cause to look for
        返回:
        True if the given Throwable contains the given cause (type equality); otherwise false
